scripts.pull:frontend: git subtree pull --prefix frontend frontend-remote main --squash
scripts.pull:backend: git subtree pull --prefix backend backend-remote main --squash
scripts.pull:all: npm run pull:frontend && npm run pull:backend
scripts.push:frontend: git subtree push --prefix frontend frontend-remote main
scripts.push:backend: git subtree push --prefix backend backend-remote main
scripts.push:all: npm run push:frontend && npm run push:backend
